creator: ELECTRONIC ARTS
descriptionHtml:
From the creators of The Sims™ series of best-selling simulation games comes a complete Sims experience on mobile! Play in real-time, customize your Sims wardrobes, build their homes, and help them live out their dreams. Complete goals to earn Simoleons, expand your Sim Town and pick up rewards along the way. Keep your Sims happy and watch them thrive as you help them live a fun and fulfilled life!
_________________

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game requires 1.8GB total storage.
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- A network connection is required to play.
_________________

Over 300 million downloads and counting!

SIM-ULATING POSSIBILITIES
From head to toe – and floor to ceiling – customize every aspect of your Sims’ lives! Keep up to 34 Sims looking stylish, and design and build their dream homes complete with swimming pools, multiple floors and incredible decor. As you get more Sims and they start a family, expand your Sim Town with a pet store, car dealership, shopping mall, and even a beach! Achieve goals for Lifestyle Points, then spend them on trendy items. Visit your real friends’ Sim Towns, where you can form new relationships and compare your friends’ interior design skills against yours. Endless possibilities. Endless mobile fun!

STAY CONNECTED
Life is better together. Start relationships, fall in love, get married, and have a family. Make lifelong friends and care for pets. Throw pool parties and grill outdoors or snuggle up by the fireplace for movie night. In the mood for some trouble? There’s plenty of drama to be had when Sims don’t get along. Act silly with teens, be rude to family members, or even say no to a marriage proposal! From babies to seniors, your perfect Sims story can happen at every stage of your life simulation. Love and friendships? Drama and breakups? The choice is always yours.

ALL WORK & ALL PLAY
A Sim’s gotta work! Start different dream careers, and even follow Sims’ days at the Police Station, Movie Studio, and Hospital. The more your Sims go to work, the more they learn skills and raise their salary, giving you rewards and setting them on a path to success. In their free time, choose different hobbies like cooking, fashion design, salsa dancing, and puppy training. The more involved they are, the happier they’ll be, from kids to teens to adults. The opportunities are limitless when you create a life your Sims love!

_________________

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @TheSimsFreePlay
Facebook.com/TheSimsFreePlay
Instagram @TheSimsFreePlayEA

Welcome to the new School Campus! Hang out with the popular kids in the common room or practice science experiments in the laboratory! Show your school spirit in our latest update, where you’ll also enjoy:

-Unlocking the School Campus House Lot grand prize in the new 'School's Out’ Live Event

-Completing the Inner Child's Play Seasonal Quest rerun to earn a Kid's Treehouse

-Earning male facial hair for Teen Sims in the latest SimChase Season 19 – School Scuffles!

Thanks for playing!

Play in real-time, customize your Sims wardrobes, build their homes, and help them live out their dreams. Complete goals to earn Simoleons, expand your Sim Town and pick up rewards along the way. Keep your Sims happy and watch them thrive as you help them live a fun and fulfilled life!
_________________

Over 400 million downloads and counting!

SIM-ULATING POSSIBILITIES
From head to toe – and floor to ceiling – customize every aspect of your Sims’ lives! Keep up to 34 Sims looking stylish, and design and build their dream homes complete with swimming pools, multiple floors and incredible decor. As you get more Sims and they start a family, expand your Sim Town with a pet store, car dealership, shopping mall, and even a beach! Achieve goals for Lifestyle Points, then spend them on trendy items. Visit your real friends’ Sim Towns, where you can form new relationships and compare your friends’ interior design skills against yours. Endless possibilities. Endless mobile fun!

STAY CONNECTED
Life is better together. Start relationships, fall in love, get married, and have a family. Make lifelong friends and care for pets. Throw pool parties and grill outdoors or snuggle up by the fireplace for movie night. In the mood for some trouble? There’s plenty of drama to be had when Sims don’t get along. Act silly with teens, be rude to family members, or even say no to a marriage proposal! From babies to seniors, your perfect Sims story can happen at every stage of your life simulation. Love and friendships? Drama and breakups? The choice is always yours.

ALL WORK & ALL PLAY
A Sim’s gotta work! Start different dream careers, and even follow Sims’ days at the Police Station, Movie Studio, and Hospital. The more your Sims go to work, the more they learn skills and raise their salary, giving you rewards and setting them on a path to success. In their free time, choose different hobbies like cooking, fashion design, salsa dancing, and puppy training. The more involved they are, the happier they’ll be, from kids to teens to adults. The opportunities are limitless when you create a life your Sims love!

_________________

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @TheSimsFreePlay
Facebook.com/TheSimsFreePlay
Instagram @TheSimsFreePlayEA
_________________

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game requires 1.8GB total storage.
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- A network connection is required to play.
_________________

descriptionShort: Celebrate Black History Month with our limited-time update!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Sul Sul! Classical guitar music and flickering candlelight weave Mariachi romance across SimTown’s Mexican-inspired atmosphere. In our Valentine’s Day update of The Sims FreePlay, you can:

- Earn your own magnificent Hispanic palace in the ‘Heart-Fluttering Hacienda’ Live Event!

-Celebrate Chinese Lunar New Year in SimChase Season 37 with special cultural outfits and decor rewards.

-Check out a new Hair Hobby event with exclusive ombre hairstyles.

Thanks for playing!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Our latest update is Handcrafted Homes. It is filled with Scandinavian-inspired designs and clean lines to decorate your Sims houses.

Key new additions:
1) Players now have the option to assign pronouns to their Sims.
2) There’s a series of three free-to-claim paintings as we celebrate Women’s History Month.
3) The update also features multiple brand-new events with which you can earn Scandinavian-themed items.
4) HAMSTERS ARE NOW IN THE GAME!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Our latest update is Handcrafted Homes. It is filled with Scandinavian-inspired designs and clean lines to decorate your Sims houses.

Key new additions:
1) Players now have the option to assign pronouns to their Sims.

3) The update also features multiple brand-new events with which you can earn Scandinavian-themed items.
4) HAMSTERS ARE NOW IN THE GAME!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Sul Sul!
In need of a summer escape?
Lots of effort to go anywhere?
We’ve got you! Everything you need to recreate an Amalfi-style theme in your Sims Town.

- Help Nonna find her rolling pin for themed prizes with 'Nona's Kitchen'
- Compete to unlock your own flower cart and more with 'Petal to the Metal'
- Build the dream Amalfi-inspired villa with a private herb garden with 'Spice of Italy'

We've also improved the game's Inbox, creating a better way to share updates and information.

Sul Sul! Here's what's new in our latest update:
1) Family Farmhouse: Spring to Action! Push the limits of how modern a farmhouse can really get. Add a home theatre, get an arcade machine, and adopt a tuxedo cat!
2) Introducing Community Market! At the brand-new Community Market, you can grow, harvest, and trade fresh produce with Sims. It's the best way in town to earn Simoleons!
